CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK(Krow__Work_Week_Hours__c), IF( Krow__Work_Week_Hours__c = 0, TRUE, FALSE ) ), 0, ( (Krow__Planned_Hours__c + IF( Krow__Project_Resource__r.Krow__Placeholder__c = TRUE,Krow__Work_Week_Hours__c,0)) / (Krow__Work_Week_Hours__c * Krow__Target_Utilization__c)) )
CustomField.label: Planned Utilization %
